label_light_lantern: Do you want to light up this lantern?
label_hardbuild1: It is going to take time before this building is spanking new...
label_upgraded_text: Your building just got leveled up!
label_FTUE_1: Hola, bienvenido! So, you are the new trainee?
label_FTUE_2: I'm going to show you how to earn muchos pesos while managing the town.
label_FTUE_3: Here's a tip: entertain the citizens! The happier they are, the more they give pesos!
label_FTUE_4: Hey, this the piñata del jefe! Smash it and collect nice gifts.
label_FTUE_5: You'll get a new piñata everyday! Come regularly: it increases your luck to win better prizes.
label_FTUE_6: This is your very own privilege as a trainee mayor! Now, smash it!
label_FTUE_7: Now we are coming to a more serious business: earning pesos!
label_FTUE_8: Place a bar: it will be our first money-making building.
label_FTUE_9: Check it out: building something takes time.
label_FTUE_10: The bar is a tiny building, so it won't take too much time. But we can't wait after these lazy workers!
label_FTUE_11: Spend a pimiento to instant-build it. Don't worry, I'll pay you back. Maybe.
label_FTUE_12: Ha, our first pesos! Gather it: just touch the icon!
label_FTUE_13: Qué? Pesos aren't incoming fast enough! I absolutely have to pay for my tuxedo pressing!
label_FTUE_14: Shops and other buildings get more efficient while the citizens number increases. Build some houses! Vamos!
label_FTUE_15: Bravo! You just won a new festivity level! Bartender, dos tequilas! We need to give a toast!
label_FTUE_16: Festivity represents the average town development. The higher it is, the richer we are!
label_FTUE_17: It's time to increase dramatically our efficiency! Let's use... La Fiesta Ultima!
label_FTUE_18: Launch a parade ! You'll earn some precious offerings!
label_FTUE_19: Driving the parade is easy : just tap your screen in the good direction. Manage to pass on the bonuses to collect them. Humm, I love these candy skulls!
label_FTUE_20: Haha! What a party! Hey, what about improving the City Hall?
label_FTUE_21: It's the main building, and we got our office right here.
label_FTUE_22: Improving the City Hall is a key process: it allows us to unlock and build more powerful buildings.
label_FTUE_23: Muy bien! But these damn workers are too slow...
label_FTUE_24: Give them some pimientos, I don't want to wait! I'll refund you soon, I promise.
label_FTUE_25: Perfecto! What a wonderful building! Such a strong symbol of my... hem, OUR power! We are going to be a bit cramped right here, we need to extend the city.
label_FTUE_26: Do you see these big lanterns? Touch one and activate it!
label_FTUE_27: You can only build in the enlightened areas. Damn security standards...
label_FTUE_28: Fenomenal! Have you ever thought about picking a look to other towns?
label_FTUE_29: We should build a gift-shop: it'll allow us to welcome visitors and to check other cities.
label_FTUE_30: Open the buildings menu, then build a gift shop! Vamos!
label_FTUE_31: Hey, it's okay to peep on your neighbors, no? Visit a friend! You'll offer him a mystery gift. Maybe he'll come visit you back!
label_FTUE_32: Touch the gift shop to open the friends menu and choose who you want to visit. Business is a matter of familia y amigos!
label_FTUE_33: Congrats, trainee! I shown all what you have to know to manage the town and do maximum profits.
label_FTUE_34: Well, now, I've got to leave you on your own... If anybody is looking for me, just say them that I'm in Cancún with pretty chicas! Here: take back your pimientos. Hasta la vista!
label_keep_going_text2: Watch a video or spend pimientos to keep the party going on!
